metadata.name: GitHub Actions Learnings
metadata.description: Learnings from GitHub Actions CI/CD implementations and issues

issue.description: GitHub deprecated v3 of artifact actions (upload-artifact/download-artifact)

symptoms.symptom: Message: "This request has been automatically failed because it uses a deprecated version"

issue.error_message: Error: This request has been automatically failed because it uses a deprecated version of `actions/upload-artifact: v3`. Learn more: https://github.blog/changelog/2024-04-16-deprecation-notice-v3-of-the-artifact-actions/

root_cause.description: GitHub Actions deprecated v3 of artifact actions on April 16, 2024

details.detail: v3 actions are no longer supported and workflows fail immediately
All workflows must upgrade to v4 to continue functioning
This is a breaking change that affects all workflows using artifact actions

solution.description: Upgrade all artifact actions to v4 in all workflow files

implementation.step: Search for all occurrences of upload-artifact@v3 and download-artifact@v3
No configuration changes needed - v4 is backward compatible

prevention.description: Keep GitHub Actions dependencies up to date

best_practices.practice: Regularly check for deprecated actions in workflows
Monitor GitHub changelog for deprecation notices
Use dependabot or similar tools to automate action updates
Test workflows regularly to catch deprecation early
Pin to major versions (v4) rather than specific tags for automatic patch updates

business_impact.impact: HIGH - Prevents CI/CD pipeline from running

details.detail: Could impact production deployments if not fixed quickly

issue.description: Inconsistent versions of actions/cache across workflows

symptoms.symptom: Some workflows use actions/cache@v3 while others use v4

solution.description: Standardize on latest stable version (v4) across all workflows

implementation.step: Ensure consistency across all workflow files

prevention.description: Maintain version consistency across all workflows

best_practices.practice: Create a standard template for common action versions
Document required action versions in SPEC

practice.name: Action Version Management
practice.description: Always use the latest stable major version of GitHub Actions

guidelines.guideline: Pin to major versions (v4) for automatic patch updates
Avoid using @master or @main tags in production
Test new major versions in non-critical workflows first
Document version requirements in workflow comments
Subscribe to GitHub changelog RSS feed
Set up dependabot for GitHub Actions
Regular monthly audits of action versions
Test workflows weekly to catch issues early
